notes: Final year of Saturn Vue (rebadged Opel Antara). Green Line hybrid with two-mode system. AWD available. Brand discontinued October 2010. Timing chain engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Vue article, January 2025 revision.

Saturn Astra rebadged Opel Astra H. Imported from Belgium. Compact hatchback with European design. Short North American run (2008-2009). Timing chain engine. Data sourced from Wikipedia Saturn Astra article, January 2025 revision.
